::KitKat::

She turned and looked at Obsidian."Very well, you may prove yourself 
in battle.  Soon, we shall fight." She turned to Megatron. "Please, 
we are at rest untill the Alience base finally comes to rest 
somewhere.  I have quarters for you ready and available." She turned 
to Obsidian, "You too may find quarters. I will need everyone ready 
to fight when that moments comes. And it will be soon." 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Obsidian:::
> 
> ::He smiles back at Goldeneye and sees the female wolfbot.  She 
must be 
> theyre leader.  he walks up to Kitkat::
> Obsidian: I hope im not interrupting something important, but i 
would like to 
> join your group.
